meanings.definition: Belonging to or associated with you
meanings.sent1: The book in thine hand is old.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in thine garden are blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent3: Thine cat thinks it owns the house!
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky are thine companions.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of thine smile lights up the room.

meanings.definition: Used to emphasize the person or thing that belongs to or is associated with you
meanings.sent1: Is that thine coat on the chair?
meanings.sent2: Thine words have brought comfort to many.
meanings.sent4: The melody of thine voice soothes my soul.
meanings.sent5: Thine presence fills the room with joy.
